meanings.definition: The use of offensive language or profanity.
meanings.sent1: Her constant swearing made everyone uncomfortable.
meanings.sent2: I don't appreciate swearing in public places.
meanings.sent3: The parrot shocked us all by mimicking the swearing it heard.
meanings.sent4: The swearing in the movie was so excessive, it distracted from the plot.
meanings.sent5: His swearing was a reflection of his lack of respect for others.

meanings.sent1: She made a solemn swearing to always protect her little brother.
meanings.sent2: The president's swearing to uphold the constitution was a powerful moment.
meanings.sent3: The cat made a funny swearing to catch all the mice in the house.
meanings.sent4: His swearing to always be there for his best friend was unwavering.
meanings.sent5: The old tree's swearing to stand tall through any storm inspired the young saplings.
